content:
1. Sterling Vineyards: features an aerial tram ride and a stunning art collection.
2. Castello di Amorosa: a medieval castle winery with authentic architecture and atmosphere.
3. Hess Collection Winery: showcases contemporary art and features a sculpture garden.
4. Frog's Leap Winery: certified organic and solar-powered, with a charming farmhouse aesthetic.
5. Darioush Winery: features Persian-inspired architecture and art, with a focus on Bordeaux-style wines.
6. Clos Pegase: designed by architect Michael Graves with a focus on Italian-inspired vineyards and art.
7. Robert Sinskey Vineyards: certified organic with a sustainable approach to winemaking, also features a culinary garden.
8. Chimney Rock Winery: known for its Cabernet Sauvignon and stunning panoramic views.
9. Palmaz Vineyards: showcases a state-of-the-art gravity-fed winery and wine cave tours.
10. Trefethen Family Vineyards: one of the few family-owned wineries still operating in Napa, with a focus on sustainability and historic architecture.
